title: Chrichi and The Little Blue Bird
description: Christian loves to spend time outdoors. One day while playing, he meets a very interesting little blue bird. This is a story about friendship, giving and how to turn a simple gift into a valuable lesson.In this beautifully illustrated children's book with easy-to-read words, kids will learn the valuable lessons of sharing and friendship. A great gift for any child.
author: Ines Starkey
